name: The Editor (itch)
description:
The Editor

The game was made for Jame gam 18, with the theme 'Time is money' and using a special object a 'clip'

You play as a editor. Who has to find the perfect 'time' in a Video 'clip' to gain the most 'money'

As the editor you have the ability to enter the video and  change the events of the video clip.

Change it and play the video to earn all the coins.

Currently the only event you can change is you can change the position of the bots by one place(you can do it when you are near them) 

You can use the slider as a timeline to go  through the video. 

The bots can pick up coin when they come in contact with them.

Currently all bots just go forward.
